channel.title: Delta how to add donor symbol $$$
channel.description: i want it so when people talk, in the chatbox it looks like this: [$$$]PLAYERNAME:TEXT like innovationx. can anyone help?

item.title: Delta how to add donor symbol $$$
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

In my server all of the listed bytes are basically the rank symbols. Like byte 6 is the owner crown and so on. The byte seven I gave you is the donator $. If you need help adding this or if it doesn’t work with your server just pm and I’ll help you out.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta how to add donor symbol $$$
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

thank you but i do not understand the code, how will that do this? what is byte 7?

Read full topic
item.source: Delta how to add donor symbol $$$

item.title: Delta how to add donor symbol $$$
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

In your server folder find the file player.java. Open it up and search for “appendPlayerChatText” you should see a code something like this if(playerRights == 3){ str.writeByte(6); } else if(playerRights == 2){ str.writeByte(8); } else if(playerRights == 1){ str.writeByte(5); } else
After the last } else add this if(donator == 1) {
str.writeByte(7);
} else

So all together your code will look something like this if(playerRights == 3){ str.writeByte(6); } else if(playerRights == 2){ str.writeByte(8); } else if(playerRights == 1){ str.writeByte(5); } else if(donator == 1) { str.writeByte(7); } else
I hope this works for you.

Read full topic
item.source: Delta how to add donor symbol $$$
